long_description: Delivering casual style and next-to-skin softness, the Buff Infinity Lyocell Scarf adds a perfect finishing touch to any outfit. A synthetic fabric made of reconstituted cellulose fibers, lyocell is soft, lightweight and breathable. Infinity Lyocell Scarf has no loose ends, creating a loop that can be doubled over for a layered look.
short_description: Delivering casual style and next-to-skin softness, the Buff Infinity Lyocell Scarf adds a perfect finishing touch to any outfit.
